mapper.select: SELECT CATE_CODE, CATE_NAME FROM ITEM_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_CODE ASC;

SELECT item.ITEM_CODE , item.ITEM_NAME , item.ITEM_PRICE , item.ITEM_STOCK , img.IMG_CODE , img.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , img.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , img.IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM item, ITEM_IMG img WHERE item.ITEM_CODE = img.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY item.ITEM_CODE DESC;

SELECT item.ITEM_CODE , item.ITEM_NAME , item.ITEM_PRICE , item.ITEM_INTRO , img.IMG_CODE , img.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , img.IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM item, ITEM_IMG img WHERE item.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND item.ITEM_CODE = img.ITEM_CODE;
